contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|rifleman}} [[Rifleman]], a private soldier in a rifle unit of infantry. '''Rifleman''' may also refer to: *A member of [[The Rifle Brigade (Prince Consort's Own)|The Rifle Brigade]] (an experimental unit of the British Army formed in 1800) or any of the brigades and regiments that derive their heritage from the original unit (see [[The Rifles]]) * [[Rifleman (bird)]] or Titipounamu (''Acanthisitta chloris''), a New Zealand bird * ''[[The Rifleman]]'', a U.S. television program starring Chuck Connors * [[ST Rifleman|ST ''Rifleman'']], a British tugboat {{disambig}}
